description:
The leader of the Kifuuken dojo. He is the father of Toshihiko and Kazuma. The latter he had with Harumi, a Shokujinki (Flesh Eater) he sacrificed in order to save the school from a rogue student. He is ultimately killed by a Shokujinki who framed Yuka.
Source: Wiki
name: Momota Juuzou
